name: Unsung Story: Tale of the Guardians
blurb: A rich, diverse Tactical RPG, envisioned by the master of the genre Yasumi Matsuno, Playdek, and you, the fans!

rewards.reward: Playdek Coffee Fund\r\n=============================\r\nHelp keep us awake and focused! Backers at this level will receive a forum badge for the Playdek Forums and acknowledgement on our special "Kickstarter Thank You" page on our website when our new website launches later this year.

Early Bird Adventure Special\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $3 rewards plus a digital copy of Unsung Story: Tale of the Guardians when it releases and a special Unsung Story Desktop Wallpaper.

Kickstart Your Adventure\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $3 rewards plus a digital copy of Unsung Story: Tale of the Guardians when it releases and a special Unsung Story Desktop Wallpaper.

Strategic Adventure\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $30 rewards plus a digital Unsung Story poster, a digital copy of the soundtrack, and a digital copy of the strategy guide for the tactical game.

Choose Your Own Adventurer\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $50 rewards plus a digital art book, beta access to the game when it is ready, and your choice of one of the following special Kickstarter Edition classes (each comes with a special skin and a special weapon with bonus stats): War Mage, Ballast Knight, Polearm Knight, or Aerolest (more details about the classes in the Game Play Overview section).

Start Your Collection\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $80 rewards plus a digital copy of the Unsung Story Card Game when it is released later this year along with 5 additional cards to add to your game, a physical Unsung Story poster, and an Unsung Story USB drive.

Adventure +1\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $50 rewards plus your name in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Producer", printed Strategy Guide, a physical Unsung Story poster, Unsung Story USB, a digital art book, beta access to the game when it is ready, and an additional digital copy of Unsung Story to give to a friend.

Behind-the-Scenes Adventure (Art)\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $140 rewards except instead of appearing in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Producer" you will be titled "Art Consultant", gain access to our Art Dev forums when they launch, help us in deciding some of monsters and NPCs for the game, an Unsung Story "Dev Team" Tshirt, both alpha and beta access when they become available, and you will be able to help play test and balance the game

Behind-the-Scenes Adventure (Design)\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $140 rewards except instead of appearing in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Producer" you will be titled "Design Consultant", gain access to our Play Test forums when they launch, help us deciding some challenges and scenarios for in-game achievements, an Unsung Story "Dev Team" Tshirt, both alpha and beta access when they become available, and you will be able to help play test and balance the game

The Collector\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $50 rewards plus a digital copy of the Unsung Story Card Game when it is released later this year along with 5 additional cards to add to your game, a physical Unsung Story poster, an Unsung Story USB drive, beta access to the game when it is ready, name in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Producer", printed Strategy Guide, a digital art book, printed art book with Yasumi Matsuno's signature, an Unsung Story Mouse Pad, physical copy of the soundtrack, special "small-scale" Collectible Figurine of a character from the game, and your choice of one of the following special Kickstarter Edition Elite classes (each comes with a special skin and 2 special weapons with bonus stats): War Mage, Ballast Knight, Polearm Knight, or Aerolest (more details about the classes in the Game Play Overview section).

The Ultimate Collector\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $50 rewards plus a digital copy of the Unsung Story Card Game when it is released later this year along with 5 additional cards to add to your game, a physical Unsung Story poster, an Unsung Story USB drive, beta access to the game when it is ready, name in the game credits as a "Kickstarter Producer", printed strategy guide, a digital art book, printed art book with Yasumi Matsuno signature, Unsung Story Mouse Pad, physical copy of the soundtrack, printed copy of the sheet music for the Unsung Story theme song, special "large-scale" Collectible Figurine of a character from the game, live online presentation access to go over development of the game, special physical printed card from Unsung Story signed by Christophe Boelinger, special physical printed card from Unsung Story signed by Playdek Art Team, and your choice of one of the following special Kickstarter Edition Elite classes (each comes with a special skin and 2 special weapons with bonus stats): War Mage, Ballast Knight, Polearm Knight, or Aerolest (more details about the classes in the Game Play Overview section).

Build the Adventure\r\n==========================\r\nReceive the $400 rewards plus a Skype meeting with the Playdek team to go over production, an Unsung Story Development Tshirt, and help design one of the following with one of the Playdek Artists: NPC, Building, or Weapon.

Become the Adventure ========================== \r\nReceive the $1,000 rewards plus have your face in the game as an NPC or Soldier and receive a specially made giclee framed art piece created and signed by the Playdek Art Team.

The Ultimate Playdek Adventure ========================== \r\nReceive the $400 rewards plus a Skype meeting with the Playdek team to go over production, an Unsung Story Development Tshirt, have your face in the game as an NPC or Soldier, receive a specially made giclee framed art piece created and signed by the Playdek Art Team, spend a day at the Playdek office, play games with members of the Playdek team, and receive an invitation to the Unsung Story Launch Party (travel and accommodations not included).

Adventures in Japan ========================== \r\nReceive the $400 rewards plus a Skype meeting with the Playdek team to go over production, an Unsung Story Development Tshirt, have your face in the game as an NPC or Soldier, receive a specially made giclee framed art piece created and signed by the Playdek Art Team, receive an invitation to the Unsung Story Launch Party, and have dinner and drinks with Joel Goodman, Gary Weis, Jeff Garstecki, Yasumi Matsuno and more in Japan (travel and accommodations not included).
